original_text: Now these things happened to them as an example, but they were written down for our instruction, on whom the end of the ages has come.
korean_text: 그들에게 일어난 이런 일은 본보기가 되고 또한 말세를 만난 우리를 깨우치기 위하여 기록되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Now these things happened to them as an example
but they were written down for our instruction
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그것들은 우리의 교훈을 위해 기록되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: on whom the end of the ages has come
